title: Travel + Leisure CEO on Earnings, Leisure Momentum
description: Michael Brown, president and CEO of Travel + Leisure Co., discusses the company’s latest earnings report and record stock close. He tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” that consumer spending on travel remains robust. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Michael Brown, president and CEO of Travel + Leisure Co., discusses the company’s latest earnings report and record stock close. He tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” that consumer spending on travel remains robust. (Source: Bloomberg)
